benchmark_details.name: Roman Urdu Dataset for Pretraining Bilingual RUBERT
benchmark_details.overview: This paper introduces a novel dataset of scraped tweets containing 54M tokens and 3M sentences for the resource-starved language Roman Urdu, enabling further research in NLP for this language.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset and model for the Roman Urdu language, facilitating NLP tasks and research in low-resource languages.

methods: Evaluation on Masked Language Modeling (MLM) and Next Sentence Prediction (NSP)
methodology.calculation: Model performance calculated based on MLM and NSP tasks metrics from pretraining.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in understanding and generating Roman Urdu from English.
methodology.baseline_results: Performance comparison with English BERT shows that RUBERT performs with notable improvement.
